column5: Set the table at noonish...first wave wont arive till 4-5PM. It should be a great time with the children. You all be well and I'll post a pic or two of the disaster afterwards.
wow !! nice spread!!! Merry Christmas Roy
Always fine dining at Monsieur Boudreau's.  Wish I was there my friend, bon appetite.

WOW is right.Very nice me brudder.  How about some music to go with that,,,,  <object style="height: 390px; width: 640px"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C5LROczmJHg?version=3"><param'>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C5LROczmJHg?version=3"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C5LROczmJHg?version=3" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" width="640" height="390"></object>

What a nice setting for a holiday Roy. We are heading down to Chez Joes for dinner featuring his signature Prime Rib, Yorkshire pudding from Gracie, my sage stuffing and more good things to eat. I will get a picture or two soon.   Art
Some kind of gourmet restaurant eh ? You set a mean table there bud.
Merry Christmas Roy !!!!  nice picture's of the before. cant wait for the "during and after"
I have always been a big fan of a nice table setting.... you instantly get the feeling something special is about to happen. Well done Roy, Merry Christmas.
Passe de belles fetes mon ami !
The place looks great Roy and as usual, you and J have gone all out for your family & friends.  Hope you guys had a fabulous day bud !!
And Merry Christmas to you too Roy very nice Christmas table,I spent all day yesterday eating!
Looks great hon, just like it did a few weeks ago when Paul and I fine dined at your house  Merry Christmas!  Joey
WOW..real xmassy scene , nice spread.  Happy Xmas Roy from Limey and family.

Well thanks guys, I feel a little embarrassed about having posted that but, I have another wave of my favourite people arriving for a few days...should be here around suppertime tonight. Life is good. Quick! I need another turkey and a side of beef! Desserts I have.
